properties.about: The Center for Public Integrity inspires change using investigative reporting that reveals the causes and effects of inequality. Our data-driven and narrative journalism holds powerful interests accountable, investigates solutions and places problems within the historical context of inequality in America.

The Center for Sustainable Journalism aims to discover innovative ways to produce financially sustainable, high quality and ethically sound journalism via applied research, collaborations and advancing innovative projects.

Civil Eats is a daily news source for critical thought about the American food system. We publish stories that shift the conversation around sustainable agriculture in an effort to build economically and socially just communities.

The Food & Environment Reporting Network (FERN) is the first independent, nonprofit news organization that produces award-winning, high-impact investigative and explanatory reporting on food, agriculture, and environmental health through exclusive partnerships with regional and national media outlets.

Grist is a nonprofit, independent media organization dedicated to telling stories of climate solutions and a just future. Our goal is to use the power of storytelling to illuminate the way toward a better world, inspire millions of people to walk that path with us, and show that the time for action is now.
A publication committed to informing and advancing movements for social, economic, racial and environmental justice. Founded in 1976.
Indian Country Today is a spacious channel that serves Indigenous communities with news, entertainment, and opinion.
Open Campus is a nonprofit news organization dedicated to investigating and elevating higher education.
A nonprofit, investigative news organization that focuses on threats to America's wellbeing.
The Conversation is a nonprofit, independent news organization dedicated to unlocking the knowledge of experts for the public good.
The Counter is a nonprofit, independent, nonpartisan newsroom investigating the forces shaping how and what America eats.
The Crime Report (TCR) is the nationâ€™s only comprehensive news service covering the diverse challenges and issues of 21st century criminal justice in the U.S. and abroad.
The Daily Yonder provides news, commentary, and analysis about and for rural America.

We cover inequality and innovation in education with in-depth journalism that uses research, data and stories from classrooms and campuses to show the public how education can be improved and why it matters.
